categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Hil" was the nickname of a clone trooper who underwent Kaminoan flash training and served in Torrent Company during the Clone Wars.
In 22 BBY, he participated in the Battle of JanFathal against the Confederacy of Independent Systems, and helped to rescue Republic Intelligence agent Hallena Devis.
Hil first appeared in the 2009 book The Clone Wars: No Prisoners by Karen Traviss.
